name: Dark Servant
description: The Dark Servant is a Medium humanoid with a stealthy and shadowy appearance, equipped with leather armor, and proficient in melee and ranged combat.
memorable: Its ability to see through magical darkness and pack tactics make it a formidable foe in darkness.
goals: To serve sinister purposes and engage enemies in combat from the shadows.
relations: Often found in the company of other dark creatures or serving powerful evil masters.
environment: Thrives in dark, shadowy areas, such as dungeons or night-time settings.
strengths: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened due to Dark Devotion, and increased effectiveness in numbers through Pack Tactics.
weaknesses: Has disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks while in sunlight, making it vulnerable in bright conditions.
attacks: Utilizes a sickle for close combat, dealing slashing damage, and a light crossbow for ranged attacks with piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Dark Devotion, providing it strong resilience against charm and fear effects.
equipment: Leather armor, sickle, and light crossbow.
senses: Possesses Darksight, allowing it to see in magical darkness without hindrance.
additional_information: Benefits from dark environments for enhanced effectiveness.
Can coordinate attacks with allies to gain advantages.
Integrates well into ambush strategies due to its stealth capabilities.
Uses both melee and ranged weapons for versatility in engagements.
Notably vulnerable to sunlight, affecting its performance significantly.
test_queries: shadowy creature that thrives in darkness
evil servant who suffers in sunlight
menacing attacker who uses sickles and crossbows
dark servant with abilities against fear effects
